pro.zackpollard.telegrambot.api.conversations.prompt

Class NumericPrompt

  • java.lang.Object
    • pro.zackpollard.telegrambot.api.conversations.prompt.TextPrompt

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConversationPrompt<TextContent>

    public abstract class NumericPrompt
extends TextValidatingPrompt
    A prompt which accepts a number from the other participant. The prompt will select the appropriate data type based on the user input.
    Author:
    Mazen Kotb
    See Also:
    INTEGER_PATTERN, DOUBLE_PATTERN, FLOAT_PATTERN
